title: (x) Billing Block font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006053745im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6681.jpg)

This is the billing font used on the "Reno 911!: Miami" theatrical poster found at [http://www.impawards.com/2007/reno\_nine\_one\_one\_miami\_xlg.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006053745/http:/www.impawards.com/2007/reno_nine_one_one_miami_xlg.html "http://www.impawards.com/2007/reno\_nine\_one\_one\_miami\_xlg.html").

I have similar fonts but can't seem to identify this exact one. The the end of the "leg" of the "R" is slightly different from the other fonts I have, for instance (mine all end without a "curl" at the end). The characteristic "Q" should be helpful, but I can't seem to find the right font anywhere.

Please help!

m.
author: kellerman

comments.content:
What the hell? This one's available on myfonts.com but whatthefont.com didn't nail it. But you were right on target.

whatthefont sucks. you rule. ;-)

Thanks ever so much!

m.
